topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Installation Guide

titlealts.searchtitle: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Installation Overivew

body.p: This document describes the process for installing HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade.

section.title: About the installation
section.p: The HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade installation installs a virtual machine for the lifecycle manager VM, creates a base HP Helion OpenStack cloud, and deploys a carrier grade cloud. You can also optionally install a baremetal region that leverages the OpenStack Ironic service.

After installation, you can interact with the HP Helion OpenStack cloud using the Horizon graphical interface or using the CLIs of the respective services to manage hypervisors and provision virtual machines.

section.p:

section.title: Deployment Models
section.p: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade has four deployment models depending on your system configuration. For each deployment model, a template is included in the installation package to facilitate the installation.

The following table indicates the components required for each deployment type. If your deployment indicates Yes in a column, you must install that component. If a column is blank, you can disregard that component.
Deployment KVM HP DCN VMware ESX Ironic Baremetal
Denver Yes
Tahoe Yes Yes
Memphis Yes Yes Yes
Sacramento Yes Yes Yes Yes

body.section:
KVM Topology using the Denver Deployment
If installing the Denver template, you are installing the KVM region and HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Accelerated vSwitch (AVS) networking.
You can also integrate HPE Storevirtual (VSA) or HPE StoreServ (3PAR) storage in the KVM region.
You must install 3PAR or VSA before starting the HP Helion OpenStack installation and are independent of HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. During the installation, you will integrate the storage into HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. See the installation instructions for the 3PAR and/or VSA parameters you will need.
Start installing the Denver deployment.
KVM with DCN Topology using the Tahoe Deployment
If you are installing the Tahoe deployment, you are installing the KVM region and HP Distributed Cloud Networking VRS networking (DCN VRS).
You can also integrate HPE Storevirtual (VSA) or HPE StoreServ (3PAR) storage in the KVM region.
You must install DCN, 3PAR or VSA before starting the HP Helion OpenStack installation and are independent of HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. During the installation, you will integrate the storage into HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. See the installation instructions for the 3PAR and/or VSA parameters you will need.
Start installing the Tahoe deployment.
KVM + ESX with DCN Topology using the Memphis Deployment
If you are installing the Memphis deployment, you are installing the KVM region and VMware ESX storage. The networking uses HP DCN VRS. This deployment allows you to manage the KVM and VMware ESX hypervisors.
You can also integrate HPE Storevirtual (VSA) or HPE StoreServ (3PAR) storage in the KVM region.
You must install DCN, ESX, and 3PAR and/or VSA before starting the HP Helion OpenStack installation and are independent of HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. During the installation, you will integrate the storage into HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. See the installation instructions for the 3PAR and/or VSA parameters you will need.
You will need to perform tasks to integrate ESX and DCN with HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. These steps are described during this installation process.Start installing the Memphis deployment.
KVM + ESX + Ironic with DCN Topology using the Sacramento Deployment
If you are installing the Sacramento deployment, you are installing the KVM region, VMware ESX storage, and a baremetal region (controlled by OpenStack Ironic). The networking uses HP DCN VRS. This deployment allows you to manage the KVM and VMware ESX hypervisors.
You can also integrate HPE Storevirtual (VSA) or HPE StoreServ (3PAR) storage in the KVM region.
You must install DCN, ESX, and 3PAR and/or VSA before starting the HP Helion OpenStack installation and are independent of HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. During the installation, you will integrate the storage into HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. See the installation instructions for the 3PAR and/or VSA parameters you will need.You will need to perform tasks to integrate ESX and DCN with HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. These steps are described during this installation process.
